entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24474.11] paint.netcore build with errors about elements from Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET are not found #43707
  • Conflict between "pt-BR" and "pt-br" folders when publishing an ASP.NET application in Docker on Linux #43701

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] With 9.0.100-rc.2.24429.8 SDK exe installed, "Warning: Workload garbage collection failed with error: Failed to get global.json GC roots Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key')" is shown after installing wasm-tools workload. #43114
  • Typo in german installer #43725
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2 creating 8.0/6.0 project requires October Servicing (8.0.10/6.0.35) feeds. #43465

PullRequests

Created

  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix typos #43730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #43721
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid reading manifest for hash #43710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid reading the manifest as part of the Build #43722
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Remove multiple file accesses per asset #43724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid generating dependent manifests if original manifest is up to date #43709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Switch to source generated System.Text.Json #43711
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid running packing logic when project is not packable #43708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43677
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always disable NuGet auditing in source-only build #43696
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] BinSkim: Enable CFG #43695
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-Workloads
  • Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2547068 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
